name: Stinky Cowboys
description:
Made in under 30 hours for the Mashup Game Jam 2022

AI-Generated Prompt:

Genre - Rhythm

Theme - Teleportation

Setting - Wild West

Item - Deodorant 

You've just entered a new town where you want to take over as the sheriff. In this town, your power is determined by your stinkiness

As you fight your way through the Sheriff's Goons, they'll try to de-stink you with balls of deodorant that they shoot to the rhythm of the song

If you manage to dodge all the deodorant and keep your stinkiness, you get closer to the title of "Sheriff"

Move left and right with the arrow keys or WASD

Wild West Music by Harvey Carman
